me_no_target: Whom do you wish to annoy with your babble?
me_self: You babble on and on to yourself, FINALLY! someone who LISTENS!!
actor_room: $n babbles endlessly, won't $e EVER shut up?
actor_other: $n babbles to $N for what seems an eternity, how can $N stand it?
actor_me: $n babbles at you. You nod mechanically, hoping $e will shut up soon.
me_actor: You babble to $N for hours on end.
